article_title: Political Deal on EU Banking Union Completed
article_text:
BRUSSELS—The European Union struck a deal on a pillar of its banking union, closing a chapter in a project that the bloc hopes will prevent euro-zone banking crises from bankrupting entire countries.

The deal, which came Thursday after all-night talks, brings to an end months of tough negotiations among European lawmakers and national governments over the shape of a so-called single-resolution mechanism, which will centralize control...

twitter.description: The European Union has struck a deal on the final leg of its banking union, which hopes to prevent euro-zone banking crises bankrupting entire countries.
